suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on refining the proportions and details of the children's faces and bodies. Add more detailed features such as eyes, noses, and mouths to make the faces more lifelike. Enhance the textures and shading on the clothing and hair to give a more three-dimensional appearance. Work on the lighting and shadows to create depth and a more realistic perspective. Additionally, ensure the proportions of the children are consistent and the perspective is accurately developed.
